attributes.action: Call a General Election if a government wants to change the Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details: Change the law to reflect the will of the people not the will of the parties.
attributes.background: Each time a party decides to get rid of an elected Prime Minister the country is by passed by the party. It should be for the people to decide a new Prime Minister not the small number of party members.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Hold a General Election within 100 days of the new PM being appointed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621931

If a Prime Minister resigns a general election should be called: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016

Impose new requirements on replacing the Prime Minister and subsequent election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623200
